We developed the R package `flowdiagramr` to allow anyone to easily create high-quality ggplot2 based flow diagrams of simulation models (and other flowcharts) with just a few lines of R code. Learn more about it [on the package website](https://andreashandel.github.io/flowdiagramr/).
